name: a fickle light #2
description: from a series - a fickle light - that focuses on artificial light and its effect on urban fauna and flora. Perhaps overhyped as an 'insect apocalypse', there is serious scientific concern over threats to insect populations from many causes. One extensive and supposedly science-based critique of this is in Quillette, by Jon Entine who has been accused of being a PR lobbyist for Monsanto and climate science denialists by US Right to Know. He denies such accusations.
